com.foreach.across.core.context.registry

Interface AcrossContextBeanRegistry

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultAcrossContextBeanRegistry

    public interface AcrossContextBeanRegistry
    Provides access to all BeanFactories present in an AcrossContext.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String BEAN

    • Method Detail

      • getContextId

        String getContextId()
        Returns:
        The unique id of the AcrossContext this registry represents.

      • getContextInfo

        AcrossContextInfo getContextInfo()
        Returns:
        the entire context info

      • getFactoryName

        String getFactoryName()
        The factory name is the unique bean name under which the registry can be found.
        Returns:
        The unique name of this AcrossContextBeanRegistry.

      • containsBean

        boolean containsBean(String beanName)
        Check if a bean is registered under the given name in the AcrossContext.
        Parameters:
        beanName - Name of the bean definition.
        Returns:
        True if bean registered.

      • moduleContainsLocalBean

        boolean moduleContainsLocalBean(String moduleName,
                                String beanName)
        Check if a bean is registered under the given name, directly in a module.
        Parameters:
        moduleName - Name of the module.
        beanName - Name of the bean definition.
        Returns:
        True if bean registered.

      • getBeanOfType

        <T> T getBeanOfType(Class<T> requiredType)
        Searches the across context for a bean of the given type.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Type of the matching bean.
        Parameters:
        requiredType - Type the bean should match.
        Returns:
        Bean found. Exception is thrown if none is found.

      • getBeanOfTypeFromModule

        <T> T getBeanOfTypeFromModule(String moduleName,
                              Class<T> requiredType)
        Searches the ApplicationContext of the specific module for a bean of the given type.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Type of the matching bean.
        Parameters:
        moduleName - Unique name of the module.
        requiredType - Type the bean should match.
        Returns:
        Bean found. Exception is thrown if none is found.

      • findBeanOfTypeFromModule

        <T> Optional<T> findBeanOfTypeFromModule(String moduleName,
                                         Class<T> requiredType)
        Searches the ApplicationContext of the specific module for a bean of the given type. Returns an empty optional if no unique bean could be found.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Type of the matching bean.
        Parameters:
        moduleName - Unique name of the module.
        requiredType - Type the bean should match.
        Returns:
        optional containing the bean found

      • getBeansOfType

        <T> List<T> getBeansOfType(Class<T> beanClass)

        Collect all beans of a given type that are visible inside this bean registry. This includes beans from ancestors, but does not include module internal beans.

        All beans will be sorted according to the Order, module index and OrderInModule values.

        Type Parameters:
        T - Specific bean type.
        Parameters:
        beanClass - Type of bean to look for.
        Returns:
        List of bean instances.
        See Also:
        AcrossOrderSpecifierComparator, OrderedInModule, Ordered

      • getBeansOfTypeAsMap

        <T> Map<String,T> getBeansOfTypeAsMap(Class<T> beanClass)

        Collect all beans of a given type that are visible inside this bean registry. This includes beans from ancestors, but does not include module internal beans.

        All beans will be sorted according to the Order, module index and OrderInModule values.

        Beans will be returned as a Map where the key is the bean name.

        Type Parameters:
        T - Specific bean type.
        Parameters:
        beanClass - Type of bean to look for.
        Returns:
        Map of bean instances with their bean name and/or module information.
        See Also:
        AcrossOrderSpecifierComparator, OrderedInModule, Ordered

      • getBeansOfType

        <T> List<T> getBeansOfType(Class<T> beanClass,
                           boolean includeModuleInternals)

        Collect all beans of a given type that are visible inside this bean registry. Depending on the second parameter, module internal beans will be included.

        All beans will be sorted according to the Order, module index and OrderInModule values.

        Type Parameters:
        T - Specific bean type.
        Parameters:
        beanClass - Type of bean to look for.
        Returns:
        List of bean instances.
        See Also:
        AcrossOrderSpecifierComparator, OrderedInModule, Ordered

      • getBeansOfTypeAsMap

        <T> Map<String,T> getBeansOfTypeAsMap(Class<T> beanClass,
                                      boolean includeModuleInternals)

        Collect all beans of a given type that are visible inside this bean registry. Depending on the second parameter, module internal beans will be included.

        All beans will be sorted according to the Order, module index and OrderInModule values.

        Beans will be returned as a Map where the key is the bean name if module internals are not included or the bean is from a parent context. If module internals are included, the bean name will be prefixed with module name.

        Type Parameters:
        T - Specific bean type.
        Parameters:
        beanClass - Type of bean to look for.
        Returns:
        Map of bean instances with their bean name and/or module information.
        See Also:
        AcrossOrderSpecifierComparator, OrderedInModule, Ordered

      • getBeansOfType

        <T> List<T> getBeansOfType(org.springframework.core.ResolvableType resolvableType,
                           boolean includeModuleInternals)

        Collect all beans of a given type that are visible inside this bean registry. Depending on the second parameter, module internal beans will be included.

        All beans will be sorted according to the Order, module index and OrderInModule values.

        This method allows looking for beans having specific generic parameters.

        Type Parameters:
        T - Specific bean type.
        Parameters:
        resolvableType - Type of bean to look for.
        Returns:
        List of bean instances.
        See Also:
        AcrossOrderSpecifierComparator, OrderedInModule, Ordered

      • getBeansOfTypeAsMap

        <T> Map<String,T> getBeansOfTypeAsMap(org.springframework.core.ResolvableType resolvableType,
                                      boolean includeModuleInternals)

        Collect all beans of a given type that are visible inside this bean registry. Depending on the second parameter, module internal beans will be included.

        All beans will be sorted according to the Order, module index and OrderInModule values.

        This method allows looking for beans having specific generic parameters.

        Beans will be returned as a Map where the key is the bean name if module internals are not included or the bean is from a parent context. If module internals are included, the bean name will be prefixed with module name.

        Type Parameters:
        T - Specific bean type.
        Parameters:
        resolvableType - Type of bean to look for.
        Returns:
        Map of bean instances with their bean name and/or module information.
        See Also:
        AcrossOrderSpecifierComparator, OrderedInModule, Ordered
